info.description: API Server for Monokit monitoring and management system
info.title: Monokit API

delete.description: Delete an existing group and optionally its hosts

post.description: Add a host to a group

delete.description: Remove a host from a group
Mark a host for deletion (admin only)

post.description: Move a host to a different inventory (admin only)

get.description: Get list of all users (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a user (cannot delete own account)

get.description: Get information about the currently logged in user

delete.description: Delete your own account (not allowed if last admin)

put.description: Update your own username, password, or email

get.description: Get list of all monitored hosts (filtered by user's inventory access)

post.description: Register a new host or update existing host information

delete.description: Delete a host from the system

post.description: Disable a component on a host
Enable a component on a host
Set the version that a host should update to

get.description: Get the status of a component on a host
Get list of all inventories with host counts (admin only)

delete.description: Schedule deletion of an inventory and all its hosts (admin only)

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL
